alert.note: Alert for Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 7:53AM AKST until February 23 at 1:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow and freezing rain. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 to 4 inches. Light glaze of ice is possible. * WHERE...Western Prince of Wales Island including Klawock, Craig, Edna Bay, Naukati Bay, and upper elevations on the road system. * WHEN...Until 1 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Travel will be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation could end as rain in some areas, but confidence is not high. Periods of freezing drizzle possible as precipitation ends.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area
